Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Oligo10 (Synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, Leu-rich, Ala-rich; UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (60%) toLL14L: 33%; A: 33%; K: 27%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 16.0 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 63.0 ug/ml), K. pneumonia (MIC 63.0 ug/ml), E. faecium (MIC 16.0 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 4.0 ug/ml), and C. acnes (MIC 2.0 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Ramata-Stunda A, Boroduskis M, Kaktina E, Patetko L, Kalnenieks U, Lasa Z, Rubina M, Strazdina I, Kalnins G, Rutkis R. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Comparative Evaluation of Existing and Rationally Designed Novel Antimicrobial Peptides for Treatment of Skin and Soft Tissue Infections
